When one attains complete knowledge, how many faculties does one attain complete knowledge of?
Answer: When one attains complete knowledge of the eye faculty,
up to when one attains separation from attachment to form, one attains complete knowledge of five faculties.
Here, complete knowledge is the fruit of the complete knowledge of the cessation of craving for those [faculties].
As for the name attaining complete knowledge of five faculties,
When the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body are free from attachment to form, they are permanently eliminated.
Although in this state thirteen faculties are eliminated,
only these five faculties are ultimately eliminated.
As with the eye faculty,
the ear, nose, tongue, and body faculties are also like this.
When the female faculty is completely known,
up to being free from attachment to the desire realm, four faculties are completely known.
Namely, the female, male, sorrow, and suffering faculties.
Although in this state nineteen faculties are eliminated,
only these four faculties are ultimately eliminated.
As with the female faculty,
the male faculty, suffering faculty, and sorrow faculty are also like this.
When the life faculty is completely known,
up to being free from attachment to the formless realm, eight faculties are completely known.
Namely, the life, thought, and equanimity faculties, and the five faculties such as faith.
As with the life faculty,
the thought, equanimity, and five faculties such as faith are also like this.
When the pleasure faculty is completely known,
up to being free from attachment to the Pure Abodes, the pleasure faculty is completely known.
When the joy faculty is completely known,
up to being free from attachment to the Extremely Clear and Luminous Heaven, the joy faculty is completely known.

eye, ear, nose, tongue, and body.

the ear, nose, tongue, and body faculties are also like this.

Up to becoming an arhat, nineteen faculties are realized to be extinguished.

female, male, sorrow, and suffering.

up to becoming an arhat,

When the faculty of pleasure is extinguished and realized,

As explained above.
